Direct Known Subclasses:
LocalEventManager, TwitterEventManager
public abstract class AbstractEventManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MikroEventManager

Provides common functionality shared with every MikroEventManager.

                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: MikroEventManager
Get all events in the database with the given keyword in the date/time range specified. Either or both of start/endTime may be null. Null values for startTime or endTime will be interpreted as negative or positive infinity, respectively. Current implementations may limit the total number of events returned.
